origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_news', 'description': 'This function retrieves news articles about a specific cryptocurrency topic within a specified duration.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The cryptocurrency topic, e.g., bitcoin, ethereum.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time duration for the news, e.g., 1 week, 1 month.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'news_articles', 'description': 'A list of news articles related to the specified topic and duration.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_news, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'bitcoin', 'duration'是'1 week'.
